Posts.Title: What to do?

Posts.Content: Hi all. I just got my diagnosis 2 days ago. I had a biopsy in Carson City Nevada and left for the season in Venice Florida the next day. I do not want to go back to Nevada for treatment. I do not have any resources here. I received a private reference for a Dr Joseph Bilik in Sarasota. I have an appointment with Dr Bilik tomorrow AM. I have tried to get an appointment a Moffitt, but I do not have a card for my new insurance yet (any day now) and they take 10 days to decide if they will take cash and another 2 to 6 weeks for an appointment. I am having a lot of anxiety here and want to know all treatment options. I am afraid of surgery because of impotency and incontinence. Any suggestions for treatment in Florida? My urologist in Nevada knows I will probably seek treatment elsewhere and was not very helpful on the phone call we had. Comparing my biopsy with others, it looks bad to me. Thoughts? I entered my results, but I don't know they will post with this. Thanks, PFS

Posts.Title: What to do?

Posts.Content: Originally Posted by Skipper Chuck PFS - I'm new here myself and still very much in the learning phase so unfortunately can't offer you any advice other than to stay strong and have hope. There are lots of good treatments out there (I'm facing the decision myself) as well as extremely knowledgeable guys here on the forum who I'm sure will have great info to help you make the right decisions. Cancer is a bitch. But you'll get through this. Skipper Chuck, Thanks for responding. It looks like you have been through this cancer thing before. I have no experience, but this forum is very helpful. Good luck with your journey through this. PFS
